features: The sight of a messy stove could have made your kitchen feel untidy and less inviting, replace with new drip pans will provide a fresh and renewed look to your kitchen stove, making kitchen appear clean, organized, and aesthetically pleasing.
Includes two 6" drip pans (outer diameter 7.54") and two 8" drip pans (outer diameter 9.76"), Fits most GE or Hotpoint Ranges

Quality material Made from high quality steel with a durable chrome coating, ensuring both functionality and longevity. Verified by 1200 Fahrenheit burn test. During this test, we simulate the intense heat generated by stove to assess if the pan will deform or if the coating will peel off. This ensures that our product can withstand the highest cooking temperatures without compromising its structural integrity or aesthetic appeal.

Energy Saving, new drip pans can reflect heat. This can help to reduce the amount of energy needed to cook your food. By reflecting the heat back up towards the bottom of the pot or pan, you can save on energy bills and make your cooking more efficient.
The drip pans are very simple to install and clean. Simply remove it from your electric range and wash it with soap and water.
body.description: Performance & Benefit When choosing a drip pan for your electric range, look for one that is made from high-quality materials. This will ensure that it is durable and long-lasting. The drip pan is made from high quality steel, making it durable and resistant to warping, rusting, and other wear and tear. The chrome coating adds an extra layer of protection (rust resistance) and complements any kitchen decor. The drip pan is easy to clean and maintain. It resists staining and allows for effortless wiping or washing, ensuring that your drip pan remains spotless and hygienic. Excellent heat reflection properties, which means the heat generated by stove is efficiently distributed throughout the pan, potentially reduce both cooking time and utility cost.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Tidy Kitchen A clean and tidy kitchen evokes a sense of serenity and harmony, where every detail is in its rightful place, creating a soothing ambiance that uplifts your spirits and brings joy to family. Replacing the drip pan is the easiest and simplest step you can take towards organizing and maintaining the pristine beauty of your kitchen, effortlessly restoring order and creating a space that inspires your culinary creativity.

About Us Purelux specialize in kitchen and bathroom hardware products. Our products suit every taste and budget, are designed to look great and perform to specific standards. We are friendly experts of home DIY. Our Goal is to create luxurious and comforting experience for every customer. By combining exceptional quality, stylish designs, and a wide range of options, Purelux ensures every customer can find perfect hardware pieces that reflect their personal style and preferences. Performance & Benefit When choosing a drip pan for your electric range, look for one that is made from high-quality materials. This will ensure that it is durable and long-lasting. The drip pan is made from high quality steel, making it durable and resistant to warping, rusting, and other wear and tear. The chrome coating adds an extra layer of protection (rust resistance) and complements any kitchen decor. The drip pan is easy to clean and maintain. It resists staining and allows for effortless wiping or washing, ensuring that your drip pan remains spotless and hygienic. Excellent heat reflection properties, which means the heat generated by stove is efficiently distributed throughout the pan, potentially reduce both cooking time and utility cost.

Enjoy A Clean & Tidy Kitchen After replacing the old drip pans with new ones, you will experience a significant shift in your feelings. The new drip pans will provide a fresh and renewed look to your kitchen stove, making it appear clean, organized, and aesthetically pleasing. The absence of spills and drips on your stove's surface will give you a sense of satisfaction and relief, eliminating the need for constant scrubbing and cleaning. This newfound tidiness will make your kitchen a more enjoyable space for cooking and entertaining.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was going to get just a basic unit but these were specifically made for the GE's so it was an exact swap. it looks like a new unit. no issues at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They are useless
reviews.reviewText: They don't fir my burners but the seller addressed my concerns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I did not have to get my hands dirty
reviews.reviewText: They are perfect. You don’t have to get your hands dirty just put them in and boom you’re done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Had to return
reviews.reviewText: This item was shipped in two packages, one of the drip pans was bent and I couldn't bend it back out so I returned it. The second package came undamaged, however it was to be an 8" pan but was too small to fit into my Roper oven. It may not have been for my type stove so I had to return that as well.

Perfect fit for my Moffat stove. I was concerned that I wouldn't find drip pans to fit my stove because none of the others had my model number. After taking a close look at the pictures I figured these would work and I was right.
These pans fit my Moffat range. They are not as good quality as OEM but looks better than the old rusted out pans.

reviews.reviewTitle: Unfortunately the bigger one not fitting at all
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The bigger pan is not fitting at all .
